info.title: ClearLift API
info.description: Production API for ClearLift analytics platform

post.description: Add an email to the pre-launch waitlist

get.description: Get basic statistics about the waitlist (public endpoint)

200.description: Password reset email sent (if user exists)

get.description: Fetches raw events from R2 SQL for a specific org_tag

200.description: Raw events from R2 SQL with validated core fields (60+ fields allowed via passthrough)

get.description: Fetches conversion data from Supabase with intelligent aggregation

200.description: Conversion data with validated core fields and flexible schema

get.description: Fetches ad performance data from various platforms. Platform availability is dynamic - if the platform's data table exists in Supabase, it will work automatically.

200.description: Ad platform data with validated core fields and flexible schema for platform-specific fields

404.description: Platform not available (table does not exist)

get.description: Retrieve Stripe revenue data with optional metadata filtering and grouping
Retrieve pre-computed daily aggregates for Stripe revenue
Fetches and merges data from multiple advertising platforms
Fetches campaign, ad group, and ad data from Supabase for a specific platform

get.summary: Get child accounts for Google Ads manager account

200.description: List of child accounts under manager account

get.summary: Get sync status for a connection
get.description: Returns the current sync status and latest sync job information for a platform connection

post.summary: Trigger a resync of connector data

200.description: List of Google Ads client accounts

put.summary: Update Google Ads account selection settings

put.description: Update configuration for a Stripe connection

post.description: Manually trigger a sync for a Stripe connection
Test that a Stripe connection is working
Create a new filter rule for a platform connection

get.description: Get all filter rules for a platform connection

post.description: Test filter rules against recent data

get.description: Discover available metadata keys from synced data
Checks the health status of cron and queue consumer workers
Returns recent job processing statistics from the queue consumer
Returns failed jobs that ended up in the dead letter queue
Tests if the access token for a connection has the correct permissions and can fetch data

post.description: Manually triggers a sync job for a specific connection. For full syncs, specify sync_window with start and end dates.

sync_window.description: Custom sync window for full syncs

403.description: No organization selected or access denied

get.summary: Get tracking configuration by org tag (public)

403.description: No organization selected or access denied
No organization selected or access denied
No organization selected or access denied
